game.description: Curse of the Lost Miner is the sequel to Caverns of the Lost Miner, featuring more diverse cave graphics and updated sound and music. General gameplay remains the same. Once again the player controls a smiling head through a total of thirteen, increasingly difficult caves, which each consist of a single screen. Each cave contains several diamonds. Once all diamonds are collected the player reaches the next cave. The gameplay is heavily influenced by Manic Miner. A life is lost if the player hits deadly objects / surfaces or falls down from high platforms.
game.name: Curse of the Lost Miner
